caption: Mauricio Lasansky (1914–2012; born Buenos Aires, Argentina; died Iowa City, IA), Amana Girl in Black Winter Coat, 1967. Engraving, etching, electric stippler, aquatint, soft ground, drypoint, relief printing, scraping and burnishing, and photoengraving; 119.4 × 55.7 cm, 142.9 × 76.5 cm (frame). Bequest of Harriet Pakula Teweles (2024-281)
